TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DispatcherExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class DispatcherExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides a set of methods that extend the class.

span.span: Provides a set of methods that extend the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类中的方法被定义为扩展的扩展方法类。The methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend the class. 这意味着，它们可以通过调用类似于实例方法对任何对象。This means that they can be called like an instance method on any object.

summary.span: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously on the thread that the was created on.

span.span: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously on the thread that the was created on.
